mapper.update: UPDATE fa_stock_hold_detail shd SET shd.freeze_days_left = shd.freeze_days_left - 1, shd.update_time = NOW() WHERE shd.STATUS = 0 AND shd.delete_flag = 0 AND shd.freeze_number > 0 AND shd.freeze_days_left > 0 AND shd.freeze_status = 0
UPDATE fa_stock_hold_detail shd SET shd.freeze_number = 0, shd.freeze_status = 1, shd.update_time = NOW() WHERE shd.freeze_days_left = 0 AND shd.freeze_status = 0 AND shd.delete_flag = 0
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE ( SUM( shd.hold_number * s.cai_trade ), 0 ) dzMarketValue, COALESCE ( SUM( shd.hold_number * ( s.cai_trade - shd.average )), 0 ) dzProfitLose FROM fa_stock_hold_detail shd LEFT JOIN fa_strategy s ON shd.stock_id = s.id WHERE shd.hold_type = 2 AND shd.`status` = 0 AND shd.delete_flag = 0 AND shd.member_id = #{memberId}
